name: Concept Studio
tagline: We are a FULL service branding and web studio!
description:
Concept Studio is a small, various award-winner group of crazy individuals located in Yerevan. In course of time we became experts in designing, developing, drinking and partying with the purpose of changing existing stereotypes and creating a new, more creative community.
We started with a very simple ambition in 2012 to create design solutions which are engaging and standing out in the crowd. We have come a long way from where we started, but our vision remains the same. We are a small group that constantly pushed the boundaries for what was possible to do in the fields of design. Our signature is great craftsmanship with a professional finishing touch.
